examples:
PS C:\> Test-CFNStack -StackName MyStack False
Tests if the stack has reached one of the states UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE, CREATE_COMPLETE, ROLLBACK_COMPLETE or UPDATE_COMPLETE.
PS C:\> Test-CFNStack -StackName MyStack -Status UPDATE_COMPLETE,UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE True
Tests if the stack has reached a status of either UPDATE_COMPLETE or UPDATE_ROLLBACK_COMPLETE. >
